== Ubuntu 11.10 Release Party at CUFE ==
A big release party with many sessions in and with large number of attendees.

=== Agenda: ===
* Take a tour with the open source & free software History(10->11). (Ahmed Toulan)
* Set your machine up with Ubuntu. (11:10 ->12:10 ). (Mahmoud Fawzy)
* Break ( 12:10 -> 12:40).
* Ubuntu is my main operating system. ( 12:40 ->:400). (Mahmoud Mohamed)
* Do you like graphics? ... GIMP is here. ( 1:50 -> 2:50). (Islam Alwazery)
* Powerful Electronics with Arduino. ( 3:00 -> 4:00). (Abdallah Hodeib)
* Discover GTKmm with Ubuntu. (4:00-> 5:00). (Mohamed Yosry)
